audio.title: Rupture
audio.Notes: A tune written whilst recovering from a ruptured Achilles. Trying to include much of the guitar techniques I had recently been working upon.

audio.title: Jeeves and Wooster theme
audio.Notes: Arranged by Jolyon Thompson for four clarinets. This was just a bit of daft fun which actually didn't sound too bad when complete.

audio.title: Suicide is Painless
audio.Notes: Arranged for garageband and guitar and the first recording I ever made in this way.
